name: Homba (CD)
description:
Wild Dogs In Winter debut full-length album. Homba comes in a lovingly crafted gatefold CD case with beautiful artwork design by Jessamy Fox, and otherworldly photography by Heidi Kuisma, that surely matches the haunting but beautiful sounds that run throughout the 10 tracks on Homba.

Homba is also available as a digital download on Bandcamp: http://wilddogsinwintermusic.bandcamp.com/album/homba

1. Coal In The Blood
2. Lung Wine
3. Powder And Tin
4. E Hu Li
5. Homba
6. Tails The Chine, Heads The Hunt
7. Salt Brother
8. A Hu Li
9. The Butcher
10. The Butcher's Wife

name: Wild Dogs In Winter EP (CD - temporarily unavailable, new stock in august)
description:
Wild Dogs In Winter EP comes as a limited edition CD, beautifully handcrafted by the band themselves, it features handsewn binding, a painted wolf and hand scrawled track listing with victorian style ink pen.

The Wild Dogs In Winter EP is also available as a digital download on Bancamp: http://wilddogsinwintermusic.bandcamp.com/album/wild-dogs-in-winter-ep

1. Good Ol' Burnt Eyes
2. Em-i-nor
3. The Smiling Troops Prevail
